Kaip vyksta užsakymo procesas?: How does the ordering process work?
Pasirenkate ar sukuriate sau tinkamą eko: You choose or create an ecosystem plan that works for you.
Pasirinkus tinkamiausią ekosistemą apmok: By choosing the most suitable ecosystem, you pay one month ahead.
Sėkminga Reklamos Ekosistemos auginimo p: Successful start of growing the Advertising Ecosystem.
Kaip vyksta darbo procesas?: How is the work process going?
Pateikiate grafikos dizaino darbo užklau: You are requesting a graphic design job on our platform.
Per 24 valandas pateikiame pirmini darbo: We provide the initial result of the work within 24 hours. You can find them in the “My Files” section.
Jei yra poreikis - pateikiate pataisymus: If there is a need - you submit corrections, when the desired result is achieved, the work is recorded completed. We will make the corrections as soon as possible, and you will receive the first corrections within 12 hours at the latest.
Per kiek laiko yra įvykdoma mano dizaino: How long does it take to complete my design request?
Pirmieji darbo rezultatai yra pateikiami: The first results of the work are delivered within 24 hours of placing the order.
Ar reikės pasirašyti sutartį?: Will I need to sign a contract?
No, you will not need to sign any contracts. To your e-mail a letter will be sent in the mail with all the conditions of the ecosystem and if you agree with them, then we will start work from the advance payment of the bill.
Ką daryti, jei paslaugos netenkina mano: What if my services don't live up to my expectations?
Darbai turi neribotus pataisymus, todėl: The works have unlimited corrections, so we can always correct unpleasant design details.
Kiek pataisymų galiu tikėtis?: How many fixes can I expect?
Tiek, kiek Jums prireiks. Pataisymus atl: As much as you need. We will make the corrections as soon as possible, and you will receive the first corrections within 12 hours at the latest.
Kiek atliktų dizaino darbų gausiu per mė: How much design work will I receive per month?
Dizaino darbų kiekis priklauso nuo Jūsų: The amount of design work depends on the Ecosystem you choose.
Kokiu būdu galiu sumokėti už paslaugas?: How can I pay for services?
Už paslaugas galite sumokėti bankiniu pa: You can pay for the services by bank transfer to the bank account of MB “Reklamos ekosistema”.
Kaip sužinosiu, kad mano planas baigiasi: How do I know my plan is ending?
Jūsų paskyroje yra nurodoma iki kada Jūs: Your account indicates how long your plan is valid. You will receive an email before your plan expires. mail with a pre-invoice. To extend the plan, you pay a plan fee. If you do not want to extend any of the plans, then you can ignore the message you received.
Ar suteikiate pinigų grąžinimą jei esu n: Do you provide a refund if I am dissatisfied with your services?
Ne, prieš pradedant darbus, Jūs sutinkat: No, you agree to the Terms and Conditions before starting work.
Kiek pirminių dizaino variantų gausiu pr: How many initial design options will I get when I start a project?
Norėdami gauti daugiau variantų, užsakym: For more options, write in the order request that you want to get several design options. Keep in mind that more options are equivalent to longer working hours (project duration may be longer).
Ar galite atlikti daugiau dizaino darbų?: Can you do more design work?
Jei viršijote savo dizaino darbų kiekį p: If you have exceeded the number of your design works per month, you can order individual works for an additional agreed price. If this happens, we recommend that you contact the contacts or chat system provided by us.
Kodėl mano projektas vyksta ilgiau, nei: Why is my project taking longer than expected?
Tai gali įvykti dėl kelių priežasčių:: This can happen for several reasons:
Projekto užklausa buvo pateikta neaiškia: The project request was unclear, so re-contact was made.
Klientas pateikė prašymą atlikti projekt: The client submitted a request for corrections to the project details.
Dizaineriui prireikus papildomos informa: When the designer needed additional information / details to do the work, the client took time to answer the questions asked.
Ne, tačiau norėdami pateikti papildomą k: No, but please contact our representative for additional comment.
Ar man priklauso teisės į dizaino darbus: Do I own the rights to the design work?
Taip, Jums priklauso visos teisės ir lic: Yes, you own all rights and licenses to the work submitted. However, if you provide unlicensed material, we cannot take responsibility for the final design product.
Ką daryti jei pamiršau užklausoje priseg: What if I forgot to attach files or provide certain information in the request?
Jei taip įvyko, prašome netrukus susisie: If this happens, please contact us shortly using the chat system or other contacts listed.
Kas turi matytis galutiniame rezultate: How end result should look like
Čia galite užpildyti užsakymo informacij: Here you can fill your order information. The order can be either one photo or their entire collection. The number symbolizes how many orders are left for this month.
Čia galite pasirinkti vieną iš 6 svetain: Here you can select one of the 6 color palettes for the site and change the look of the site.
Čia galite matyti aktyvių projektų būsen: Here you can see the status of active projects. You will receive a notification when the order has the results ready for review. Going to the results page next to the order will allow you to leave a comment or if everything is suitable you will be able to download results and change the status of the order to completed.
Čia galite įkelti diskusijos metu aptart: Here you can upload files discussed during the communication, they do not necessarily belong to the order or the company brand.
Čia galite matyti pabaigtus arba atšaukt: Here you can see completed or canceled projects, view them, edit them, and if you change your mind, change the status to editable, which will make it active.
Čia galite rasti atsakymą į dažniausiai: Here you can find answers to the most frequently asked questions, if you did not find the answer you can always write directly to the designers.
Čia galite aptarti su dizaineriu užsakym: Here you can discuss the progress of the order, questions and observations with the designer, upload files in the My Files section so that the required files are not lost between messages when there are many of them.
Jeigu turėsite užsakymų, kurie turės tą: If you have orders that will have the same color palette or similar theme, you can create a company brand and add it during order creation.
